1.name: Website showcasing animations and basic website development
1.related-to: Advanced CSS and Sass: Flexbox, Grid, Animations and More! By Jonas Schmedtmann
1.description: Completed during the Advanced CSS and Sass course, this website was designed by the course creator. This project centered around creating effective animations and interesting design elements.

2.name: Website with deep dive into Flex Grid
2.related-to: Advanced CSS and Sass: Flexbox, Grid, Animations and More! By Jonas Schmedtmann
2.description: This website was completed during the Advanced CSS and Sass course, and is centered around the use of flex box in an effective manner.

3.name: Culture Guide website
3.description: Created with a group of 3 other students, in associating with Haaga-Helia and an American university. The main purpose of this project was to build an effective website following a theme (cultural diversity). The project emphasizes the work needed to create valid, accessible, and usable information displays for a global audience.
